title: xECG-Beats: an explainable deep transfer learning approach for ECG-based heartbeat classification
details: A Peimankar, A Ebrahimi, UK Wiil - Network Modeling Analysis in Health Informatics …, 2024
abstract: Early detection of abnormal heartbeats is of great importance for cardiologists for early diagnosis of cardiac diseases. This will help patients to receive in time diagnosis and prevention. Conventionally, physicians provide cardiac diagnoses by …
